author: arj
msg: Tweaks to Ant script to better encapsulate Jar-signing operations. Also, test-prep activities more automated.

author: arj
msg: Weblog plugin now accepts additional parameter for customizing the date format. It also tries to extract the "headline" of the blog and puts it at the top of the entry section.

author: arj
msg: Loosened algorithm for identifying presence of CMA. It now accepts any Role for constraints, not just Authenticated or Admin.

author: arj
msg: Tweaked test to accomodate use of PrincipalWrapper.

author: arj
msg: Added jaas, policy, userdatabase and WEB-INF to list of excluded files.
